The check class() function is meant to be used within your primary navigation, and performs a very simple check to see if the first parameter matches the name of the controller that is currently running.
function check_class($item = '')
A simple helper method for checking menu items against the current class that is running.
The check method() function is identical to the check class() function, above, except that it is meant for sub-navigation based on the method currently being executed (according to the router).
function check_method($item)
A simple helper method for checking menu items against the current class’ method that is being executed (as far as the Router knows.)
